alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 30 at 2:12AM AKDT until September 30 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, the Taiya River. * WHEN...Until 630 AM AKDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 209 AM AKDT, River gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in areas along low lying portions of the Chilkoot Trail. Minor flooding is ongoing near the Taiya River. - For Taiya River near Skagway: At 1:00am the stage was 16.53 feet. Flood Stage is 16.5 feet. Impacts: At 16.1 feet: Portions of the Chilkoot Trail begins to inundate with water. At 16.8 feet: Portions of the first few miles of the Chilkoot Trail will begin to inundate with water to ankle depth.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
